summary: The module defines a suite of loss components for training a FastPitch text-to-speech system, each measuring the error between predicted and target values for duration, energy, mel‑spectrogram, and pitch while specifying the required neural type signatures for seamless integration into NeMo pipelines.
business_intent: Support the development and fine‑tuning of FastPitch TTS models by delivering precise, differentiable loss calculations for key acoustic and prosodic features, ensuring correct type handling and efficient training within the NeMo framework.
